Name: Hotel Guest Visit
Description: A CVT to note the accommodation which had a recorded visit to it, by a "famous" person who was the guest, and the date(s) of the guests stay.

Properties.Name: Date of Stays
Properties.Description: The date on which the person began their stay(s)

Properties.Name: Notable Guest
Properties.Description: The Notable person who stayed at the hotel

Properties.Name: Hotel Visited
Properties.Description: The Hotel which the Notable Person (the guest) stayed at
